thread.title: New Fiber Optic Branch Office in SoCal - Kamaxoptic Communication
thread.title_full: New Fiber Optic Branch Office in SoCal - Kamaxoptic Communication - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: New Fiber Optic Branch Office in SoCal - Kamaxoptic Communication
text:
New Fiber Optic Branch Office in SoCal - Kamaxoptic Communication
Rancho Cucamonga, CA, October 22, 2015 --( PR.com )-- After 14 years of success and being one of the top leaders in manufacturing passive componenets across Asia, Europe, Africa and South America. The KOC group is happy to announce the opening of its new branch in Los Angeles, California. Kamaxoptic Communication is extremely excited about the expansion in the US Market and is looking forward to building new relationships.
Kamaxoptic has full engineer drawings and specifications provided for SoC and approvals processes.
The production capacity exceeding 500K fibre terminations per month means all orders are processed with effortless efficiency and products are utilized by telecom operators and data centers worldwide, which provides you with the confidence to offer the products in your projects, without hesitation.
You will find a full range of quality products:
Fiber Management equipment (patch panels, wall mounted boxes, subscriber boxes, multimedia boxes)
Couplers / Splitters
Patchcords, attenuators, adapters
New FIC Connector
MPO assemblies (Panels/Cassettes)
WDM / CWDM
Fttx products and more...
Find out more about Kamaxoptics' products and especially its very competitive pricing without compromising on quality. All goods are shipped directly from Shenzhen to your doorstep.
